description: This file defines a REST controller in a Spring Boot application, providing basic endpoints such as a welcome message, documentation redirect, health check, and app info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: Spring Boot REST controller providing basic endpoints for root, documentation redirect, health check, and application info.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a welcome message indicating the application is running.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects the user to the Swagger UI page, preserving the original request scheme, host, and port.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Returns a simple 'OK' status indicating the application health.

methods.name: info
methods.description: Returns a string with application information.
